funny.quote: Laziness is such an ugly word, I prefer selective participation.
funny.title: Devil Is A Part-Timer!

funny.quote: An apple a day keeps anyone away if you throw it hard enough!
funny.title: Soul Eater

funny.quote: Laziness is the mother of all bad habits. But ultimately, she is a mother and we should respect her.
funny.title: Naruto

funny.quote: My hobby is eating different kinds of ramen and comparing them.
funny.title: Naruto

funny.quote: I have two rules. Rule one: I’m always right. Rule two: If I’m wrong, refer to rule one…
funny.title: Death Note

funny.quote: Now all that is left is the destruction of the earth, but I think it would be a waste to destroy it. The food of this planet is very delicious.
funny.title: Dragon Ball Super

funny.quote: Don't you know it's rude to grow mushrooms in other people's closets?!!
funny.title: Ouran Host Club

funny.quote: I have a family of my own I need to tend to. Two boys and a wife. An extremely angry wife who probably wants to kill me right now.
funny.title: Dragon Ball Z

funny.quote: There are three things I cannot tolerate: cowardice, bad haircuts, and military insurrection, and it is very unfortunate that our friend Vegeta possesses all three of these.
funny.title: Dragon Ball Z

funny.quote: Our weakness is that we are morons.
funny.title: Angel Beats

funny.quote: I see. I do not understand even one of those problems.
funny.title: Naruto

funny.quote: Please don't worry, Mister, I only came here to obliterate you, not rob you.
funny.title: Excel Saga

funny.quote: When you’re in high school you should be doing things, about which you could never tell your parents!
funny.title: Bleach

funny.quote: I don’t wanna brag or anything, but when it comes to being the worst - I’m at the top.
funny.title: Fate Apocrypha

funny.quote: The only thing more important than wearing the right underwear to the doctor is wearing the right underwear into battle.
funny.title: Naruto

funny.quote: A true hero always arrives late.
funny.title: Naruto

funny.quote: If you use your head, you won’t get fat even if you eat sweets.
funny.title: Death Note

funny.quote: If you die, I’ll kill you!
funny.title: One Piece

funny.quote: Don’t talk, it makes you sound stupid.
funny.title: Yu Yu Hakusho

funny.quote: I can’t develop feelings. That’s how most idiots screw up.
funny.title: Death Note

funny.quote: What a low blow! You fiend of a child! A punch to the scrotum is unforgivable!
funny.title: My Hero Academia

funny.quote: If you keep this secret, this strawberry is yours.
funny.title: Death Note

funny.quote: So tell me, what’s it like living in a constant haze of stupidity?
funny.title: Yu Yu Hakusho

inspirational.quote: The difference between a novice and a master is that a master has failed more times than a novice had tried.
inspirational.title: Assassination Classroom

inspirational.quote: I hate perfection. To be perfect is to be unable to improve any further.
inspirational.title: Bleach

inspirational.quote: Every journey begins with a single step. We just have to have patience.
inspirational.title: Trigun

inspirational.quote: If you don’t like the hand that fate’s dealt you with, fight for a new one.
inspirational.title: Naruto

inspirational.quote: You’ve got two legs and a heartbeat. What’s stopping you?
inspirational.title: Inuyasha

inspirational.quote: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future.
inspirational.title: One Piece

inspirational.quote: Learn to treasure your life because unfortunately, it can be taken away from you anytime.
inspirational.title: Death Note

inspirational.quote: Don’t give up, there’s no shame in falling down! The true shame is to not stand up again!
inspirational.title: Kuroko no Basuke

inspirational.quote: It’s more important to master the cards you’re holding than to complain about the ones your opponent was dealt.
inspirational.title: Pokémon

inspirational.quote: Life is not a game of luck. If you wanna win, work hard.”
inspirational.title: No Game No Life

inspirational.quote: Fear is not evil. It tells you what weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.
inspirational.title: Fairy Tail

inspirational.quote: The ticket to the future is always open.”
inspirational.title: Trigun

inspirational.quote: Be your own hero.
inspirational.title: My Hero Academia

inspirational.quote: Even if I'm broken, I will never give up.
inspirational.title: Demon Slayer

inspirational.quote: Not giving up is my magic.
inspirational.title: Black Clover

inspirational.quote: Believe in your own power.
inspirational.title: Attack on Titan

inspirational.quote: Work at it. All I can do is work hard! That's the story of my life!
inspirational.title: Demon Slayer

inspirational.quote: No matter how many people you may lose, you have no choice but to go on living. No matter how devastating the blows might be.
inspirational.title: Demon Slayer

inspirational.quote: People’s lives don’t end when they die, it ends when they lose faith.
inspirational.title: Naruto

inspirational.quote: The moment you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.
inspirational.title: Fairy Tail

inspirational.quote: Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.
inspirational.title: Dragon Ball

inspirational.quote: The only way to truly escape the mundane is for you to constantly be evolving. Whether you choose to aim high, or aim low. Enjoy each day for what it is.
inspirational.title: Durarara!!

inspirational.quote: No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
inspirational.title: One Piece

inspirational.quote: A person grows up when he’s able to overcome hardships. Protection is important, but there are some things that a person must learn on his own.
inspirational.title: Naruto

inspirational.quote: If you can’t do something, then don’t. Focus on what you can do.
inspirational.title: Log Horizon

inspirational.quote: There’s no such thing as a painless lesson. They just don’t exist. Sacrifices are necessary. You can’t gain anything without losing something first.
inspirational.title: Fullmetal Alchemist

inspirational.quote: Hard work betrays none, but dreams betray many.
inspirational.title: My Youth Romantic Comedy Is Wrong, As I Expected

inspirational.quote: Sometimes I do feel like I’m a failure. Like there’s no hope for me. But even so, I’m not gonna give up. Ever!
inspirational.title: My Hero Academia

inspirational.quote: If you begin to regret, you’ll dull your future decisions and let others make your choices for you.
inspirational.title: Attack on Titan

inspirational.quote: You can die anytime, but living takes true courage.
inspirational.title: Rurouni Kenshin

inspirational.quote: No matter how scared you are, you should smile to show that you’re okay. Because in this world, the ones who are smiling are the strongest.
inspirational.title: My Hero Academia

inspirational.quote: Do exactly as you like. That is the true meaning of pleasure. Pleasure leads to joy and joy leads to happiness.
inspirational.title: Fate/Zero

inspirational.quote: Pain is your friend; it is your ally. Pain tells you when you have been seriously wounded. And you know what’s the best thing about pain? It tells you that you’re not dead yet!
inspirational.title: Tokyo Ghoul

inspirational.quote: When you hit the point of no return, that’s the moment it truly becomes a journey. If you can still turn back, it’s not really a journey.
inspirational.title: A Place Further than the Universe

inspirational.quote: When you’re scared, it’s all the more reason to move forward.
inspirational.title: Gurren Lagann

inspirational.quote: Stand up and walk. Move on. After all, you have perfect legs to stand on.
inspirational.title: Fullmetal Alchemist

inspirational.quote: Mistakes are not shackles that halt one from stepping forward. Rather, they are that which sustain and grow one’s heart.
inspirational.title: Fairy Tail

inspirational.quote: If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don’t fight, you can’t win!
inspirational.title: Attack on Titan

inspirational.quote: The circumstances of one’s birth are irrelevant, but it is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are.
inspirational.title: Pokémon: The First Movie

inspirational.quote: If you really want to become strong, stop caring about what others think about you. Living your life has nothing to do with what others think.
inspirational.title: One Punch Man

inspirational.quote: A dropout will beat a genius through hard work.
inspirational.title: Naruto
